description:
The team behind Homeland dropped a bombshell on fans Friday night at PaleyFest when asked about the upcoming fifth season.在Paley Fest周五晚活动上，在问到《国土安全》第五季相关消息时，幕后团队给了粉丝们一个爆炸性的消息。

Alex Gansa, the co-creator of the acclaimed Showtime drama, revealed during the panel that the upcoming season will "jump two-and-a-half years" in the future. "We are going to be shooting the show in Europe, probably in Germany, and Carrie will no longer be an intelligence officer," he said.该剧的联合制片人Alex Gansa表示，这部美剧第五季将会讲述未来两年后的故事。“我们将会在欧洲拍摄，很有可能是德国，而Carrie也不再是CIA的精英特工。”

Claire Danes, who stars as Carrie and executive-produces, joked, "She's making beer."在剧中扮演女主Carrie同时也担任执行会长骗人的Claire Daes开玩笑说，“她会在德国做啤酒。”

title: 《国土安全》第五季Carrie不当特工
